articles.author: Jim Tankersley
articles.title: Biden Signs $1 Trillion Infrastructure Bill Into Law - The New York Times
articles.description: Billions of dollars will now pour into American communities, although the final bill falls short of the president’s ambitions.
articles.content: This is not designed to be stimulus, Cecilia Rouse, who chairs the White House Council of Economic Advisers, said in an interview. Its designed to be the most strategic, effective investments so that… [+2183 chars]

articles.title: NHL postpones 3 Senators games due to COVID-19 outbreak - CBC.ca
articles.description: The NHL postponed three Ottawa Senators games on Monday amid a COVID-19 outbreak on the team, the first time any of North America's major professional sports leagues have been hit by rescheduling this fall because of the coronavirus.

articles.author: Julia Horowitz, CNN Business
articles.title: Xi and Biden are meeting. There's a lot at stake for their economies - CNN
articles.description: Managing America's relationship with its biggest economic frenemy is one of US President Joe Biden's toughest challenges.
